title: JSON API Schema

oneOf.description: An array of resource objects, an array of resource identifier objects, or an empty array ([]), for requests that target resource collections.

$eref.description: The document's "primary data" is a representation of the resource or collection of resources targeted by a request.
"Resource objects" appear in a JSON API document to represent resources. Ids are required, except on the creation request.
